item.title: IT: Welcome to Derry episode 3 features a key piece of Stephen Kings IT that was left out of the movies
item.description: "IT: Welcome to Derry" calls back to an important element of Stephen King's "IT" that didn't wind up in Andy Muschietti's movies.

item.title: IT: Welcome to Derry episode 3: Did you spot the Andy Muschietti cameo?
item.description: In "IT: Welcome to Derry" episode 3, executive producer Andy Muschietti pops up in a brief cameo. Did you spot him?
